triqs::gfs::matsubara_freq Struct Reference

#include <matsubara.hpp>

Public Attributes

int n
double beta
statistic_enum statistic

Detailed Description

A matsubara frequency, i.e. * n : int, the index * beta : double, the temperature inverse * statistic : Fermion or Boson

* Can be casted into a complex.

* Every operations is done by casting to complex, except addition and substraction of matsubara_freq, which return matsubara_freq and work on the index
